title:
Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen;
stainless stell and PP material; colors: blue, gray, pink; size: 17x4.5 cm;
descriptions:

Say goodbye to the frustration of dealing with ice and frost on your fridge! Our Fridge Ice Scraper is designed to effortlessly remove ice and frost, leaving your fridge clean and tidy. Its compact size, measuring approximately 17 x 4.5 cm, makes it the perfect tool for all your household needs. 

Choose from three stunning colors - Blue, Grey, and Pink - to match your kitchen decor and personal style. The package includes one Fridge Ice Scraper, so you'll always have a reliable tool on hand. 

Please note that there may be a 1-5mm measuring deviation due to manual measurement, and the actual color of the item may vary slightly from the pictures due to different monitors and lighting effects.
